alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:24PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scotts Bluff and east central Goshen Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yoder, or 13 miles south of Torrington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lyman around 350 PM MDT. Stegall around 400 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
